brochureDormitoriesDesc: Secure and well-maintained dormitory rooms with various capacities to suit your needs during your training or stay.
brochureHallsDesc: Spacious halls and sections perfect for meetings, trainings, conferences, and events of all sizes, equipped with modern amenities.
brochureCateringDesc: Offering a range of catering options from simple refreshments to full lunch services to complement your events.
brochureAboutUsContent: {siteName} is a premier institution dedicated to providing top-notch educational research, training facilities, and accommodation. We strive for excellence in all our services, ensuring a conducive environment for learning, collaboration, and growth.
brochureSubtitle: Your ideal partner for educational events, training programs, and comfortable stays in Oromia.
brochureKeyFeaturesMore: ...and many more facilities to make your experience productive and comfortable.
brochureWhyChooseCommitmentToQuality: Commitment to quality and customer satisfaction.
brochureCallToActionTitle: Get in Touch or Book Today!
brochureCallToActionDesc: Contact us for more information or to make a booking. Our team is ready to assist you with your requirements.
discoverMoreSubtitle: Scan the QR code below to view our detailed digital brochure or visit our website.
scanForBrochureDesc: Access our services and facility details on your mobile device.
faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services.
faqQ1Title: How do I book a dormitory room?
faqQ1Answer: You can book a dormitory room by visiting our 'Dormitories' page, selecting your preferred dates, choosing an available room, and filling out the booking form. Payment details will be provided upon request submission.
faqQ2Title: What types of halls and sections are available?
faqQ2Answer: We offer a variety of halls for large conferences and smaller sections for meetings or training sessions. Capacities and specific features are listed on the 'Halls & Sections' page.
faqQ3Title: Are catering services available for hall bookings?
faqQ3Answer: Yes, we offer different levels of lunch and refreshment services for events booked in our halls and sections. You can select your preferred catering options during the booking process.
faqQ4Answer: For dormitory bookings, payment is typically made via bank transfer after submitting your request. For facility bookings by companies, we will contact you with payment details after your booking is approved. We use Chapa for online payment processing when applicable.
faqQ5Title: Can I book multiple halls or sections at once?
faqQ5Answer: Yes, company representatives can select multiple halls and/or sections from our 'Halls & Sections' page and book them together for the same date range and event.
faqQ6Title: What is the process for company registration?
faqQ6Answer: Companies can register through the 'Register Company' link. After submission, the registration will be reviewed by our admin team. Once approved, company representatives can log in and book facilities.
faqQ7Title: Who should I contact for support?
faqQ7Answer: For general inquiries, please use the contact details on our 'Contact Us' page. For specific building-related issues, contact information for building administrators is also available there.

sorryYouCannotBookTwice: Sorry, you cannot book a dormitory room for the same phone number on the same start day if a pending or approved booking already exists. Please check your existing bookings or contact us if you believe this is an error.
duplicateCheckSkippedBookingProceeds: A database index is needed for optimal duplicate booking checks. The check was skipped, and your booking request will proceed. Please inform the site administrator.

termsPlaceholder1: 1. Payment: Full payment is due upon signing this agreement unless otherwise specified in writing. All payments are non-refundable except under conditions outlined herein.
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Cancellation: Cancellations made less than [X] days prior to the event date will forfeit [Y]% of the total booking cost. Cancellations made less than [Z] days prior will forfeit the full amount.
termsPlaceholder3: 3. Use of Facility: The Client agrees to use the facility solely for the purpose stated at the time of booking and in a lawful manner. The Client is responsible for any damage caused to the facility or equipment by their attendees.
termsPlaceholder4: 4. Liability: The Service Provider is not responsible for loss or damage to personal property of the Client or their attendees. The Client agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Service Provider from any claims arising out of their use of the facility.
